<Heading
  as={"h1"}

  children={"Create Group"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/groups"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Create a new group.

You can find more information about groups [here](https://singularity.stereov.io/docs/guides/auth/groups).

**Locale:**

Group names and descriptions can be specified in multiples languages.
These can be set when [creating](https://singularity.stereov.io/docs/guides/auth/groups#creating-groups)
groups or through [updates](https://singularity.stereov.io/docs/guides/auth/groups#updating-groups).

**Note:** A translation for the application's default locale must exist.
You can learn more about configuring the default locale [here](https://singularity.stereov.io/docs/guides/configuration).

The `locale` request parameter specifies in which language the information should be returned.
If no locale is specified, the application's default locale will be used.

**Tokens:**
- A valid [`AccessToken`](https://singularity.stereov.io/docs/guides/auth/tokens#access-token)
  with [`ADMIN`](https://singularity.stereov.io/docs/guides/auth/roles#admins) permissions is required.

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>

  parameters={[{"name":"locale","in":"query","required":false,"schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"key":{"type":"string","description":"A unique key for the group.","example":"pilots"},"translations":{"type":"object","additionalProperties":{"type":"object","properties":{"name":{"type":"string"},"description":{"type":"string"}},"required":["description","name"],"title":"GroupTranslation"},"description":"A map of locale to group translation.","example":{"en":{"name":"Pilots","description":"People who can fly"},"de":{"name":"Piloten","description":"Personen, die fliegen kÃ¶nnen"}}}},"required":["key","translations"],"title":"CreateGroupRequest"}}},"required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Information about newly created group.","content":{"*/*":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"key":{"type":"string"},"locale":{"type":"string"},"name":{"type":"string"},"description":{"type":"string"}},"required":["description","key","locale","name"],"title":"GroupResponse"}}}},"400":{"description":"Translation for default locale is missing.","content":{"*/*":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"timestamp":{"type":"string","format":"date-time"},"status":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"},"error":{"type":"string"},"message":{"type":"string"},"path":{"type":"string"}},"required":["error","status","timestamp"],"title":"ErrorResponse"}}}},"401":{"description":"Invalid or expired `AccessToken`.","content":{"*/*":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"timestamp":{"type":"string","format":"date-time"},"status":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"},"error":{"type":"string"},"message":{"type":"string"},"path":{"type":"string"}},"required":["error","status","timestamp"],"title":"ErrorResponse"}}}},"403":{"description":"User does not have `ADMIN` role.","content":{"*/*":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"timestamp":{"type":"string","format":"date-time"},"status":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"},"error":{"type":"string"},"message":{"type":"string"},"path":{"type":"string"}},"required":["error","status","timestamp"],"title":"ErrorResponse"}}}},"409":{"description":"Group with this `key` already exists.","content":{"*/*":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"timestamp":{"type":"string","format":"date-time"},"status":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"},"error":{"type":"string"},"message":{"type":"string"},"path":{"type":"string"}},"required":["error","status","timestamp"],"title":"ErrorResponse"}}}}}}
